title: Jeb: 我在玩1.11公共服务器
author: ff98sha
txt_content:
原文：Snapshot is cooking! Meanwhile, I'm on a public vanilla 1.11 server here, minecraft.readjust.se:25565
译文：快照还在酝酿中！同时，我在玩minecraft.readjust.se:25565这个公共1.11的原版服务器！
来源：Jeb的推特

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content:
我也去看看？
去玩玩看.

replies.txt_content:
